p.v: 右击以使诅咒定型而可施放

p.k: Add an enchanted mirror shard to increase strength, but affect the caster equally.
p.v: 放入附魔镜之碎片以增强诅咒效力，但同时施放者也会受其影响。

p.k: No Ingredients
<?> I don't need anymore help at the moment, we can speak again later [[new content will come in a future update]]
p.v: <?> 我目前不需要帮助了，也许我们可以来日再叙。[[新内容请等候将来的更新]]

p.k: <?> Thank you! I've absorbed all the power I want.
p.v: <?> 非常感谢！我已吸收了所有我需要的力量。

p.k: Feel free to use the Celestial Staff to absorb more demonic energy, but I have no need of it.
p.v: 你当然还能用天象法杖吸收更多恶魔能量，但我已不再需要了。

p.k: Do not fear, the staff can contain a fair bit of energy safely. Just don't hand it to anyone you don't trust.
p.v: 无需害怕，法杖本身能安全装下相当量的能量。只要不交予你不信任的人便万事大吉。

p.k: <?> The demon realm is full of dangerous energy, you can remove some of it by using this staff. (right click in the air)
p.v: <?> 恶魔领域满溢着危险的能量，你可以用这支法杖去除一些。（对空气右击）

p.k: <?> Thank you! Keep collecting more demonic energy, and return it to me for safekeeping. It can be dangerous in the wrong hands.
p.v: <?> 多谢！继续去收集恶魔能量吧，然后交还于我妥善处置。这些能量要是落入恶人之手，莫大危险就可能来临。

p.k: <?> Here is the Celestial Staff. Good luck on your quest, and may the stars guide you.
p.v: <?> 这就是天象法杖。祝你好运，愿群星指引你。

p.k: <?> If you succeed, please return with the energy you have absorbed so I can lock it away. It could be dangerous in the wrong hands.
p.v: <?> 若任务成功，请将你吸收到的能量交给我，我会封印它们。这些能量要是落入恶人之手，莫大危险就可能来临。

p.k: <?> I have one final request that I believe can benefit us both.
p.v: <?> 我还有最后一项请求，我相信它对我们双方都有利。

p.k: <?> The demon realm you currently reside in, it is so dangerous. The very energy of the world is toxic to life.
p.v: <?> 你身处的恶魔领域极为危险。这个世界本身的能量对生命有害。

p.k: But I've found a way to fix it, to absorb that energy and lock it away safely.
p.v: 但我找到了改变这一现状的方式，也即吸收能量再加封印。

p.k: If you give me an arcane staff, I shall entrust you with the Celestial Staff,
p.v: 若你能交予我奥术法杖，我便会将天象法杖交予你，作为信任的象征。

p.k: which you could use to absorb this energy.
p.v: 你可以用这支法杖吸收恶魔能量。

p.k: <?> I still need
<?> I'd like to offer a deal. I find myself in need of
p.v: <?> 我想提出一项交易。我现在很是需要

p.k: <?> If you provide the
, I'll give you a powerful item in exchange.
p.v: ，我便会给你一件强大物品作为交换。

p.k: The mirror shard doesn't seem to fit... maybe there's another kind somewhere?
p.v: 这枚镜之碎片拼不进去……也许还有另一种镜之碎片？

p.k: <?> Thank you, that's all the items I need for now!
p.v: <?> 非常感谢，我需要的物品都在这里了！

p.k: <?> Here is your reward. If you wish to trade again, I'm always interested.
p.v: <?> 这是你的奖励。若你仍想要交易，我一直都会在。

p.k: <?> Thanks, but I still need
more
<?> I have no need of that item right now, can you get me some
p.v: <?> 我现在不需要这种物品，你能否给我一些

p.k: <?> Currently I have no need of any items, but perhaps we can arrange a trade in the future?
p.v: <?> 目前我不需要任何物品，但也许将来我们还可再进行交易？

p.k: <?> Thanks for the gift... it's been so long since I've received one!
p.v: <?> 多谢你的礼物……我已经很久没有收到过礼物了！

p.k: You can see dark colors swirling in the mirror.
p.v: 你看见深邃的色彩在镜中回旋。

p.k: There's something on the other side of the portal, but can't see it.
p.v: 传送门的另一侧似乎有些东西，但你没法看见它。

p.k: Right-click to communicate with the being.
You can also toss in an item as an offering.
p.v: 你可以扔出物品作为赠物。

p.k: It appears to be a portal, but you can't seem to put your hand through...
p.v: 它看上去像一扇传送门，但你没法把手伸进去……

p.k: Maybe try throwing in an item?
p.v: 也许可以试试扔进一个物品？

p.k: This is a mysterious broken mirror frame...
p.v: 这是一个神秘的破碎镜框……

p.k: Maybe some kind of mirror shard fits here?
p.v: 也许某种镜之碎片能拼进去？

p.k: It can fit
more ancient mirror shards.

COMBAT

PATROL

's Bound Wither
Unbound Wither
Proactive spell:
Corrodes blocks and damages entities
Targets the spell on the block above the player.
p.v: 使法术指向玩家头顶的方块。

p.k: Delays the resolution of effects placed to the right of this spell for a few moments. The delay may be increased with the Extend Time augment, or decreased with Duration Down.
p.v: 将此构件右侧构件的起效时间稍作延迟。以延长时效修饰可增加延迟时间，以缩短时效修饰则可减少。

p.k: Corrodes blocks and damages entities
Targets the spell on the block beneath the player.
p.v: 使法术指向玩家脚下的方块。

p.k: Summons the wither, add cursed bind to force it to obey you.
p.v: 召唤凋灵，以诅咒绑定修饰就能强令其遵从你。

p.k: A spell you start with. Summons a projectile that applies spell effects when this projectile hits a target or block. Sensitive will allow Projectiles to break plants or other materials that do not block motion.
p.v: 你的初始法术构件。召唤一个弹射物，弹射物命中目标或方块时会造成法术效果。被敏感构件增强后，弹射物能击中草之类不影响实体移动的方块。

p.k: Flattens the target against the block below them, doing damage based on the hardness
p.v: 向目标下方方块挤压目标，根据方块硬度造成伤害。

p.k: Converts a block into a valuable mineral, add levels of amplify to improve the material.
p.v: 将方块转换为高价值材料，增加强化的个数以提高产物价值。

p.k: A powerful harming effect that is almost impossible to cure
p.v: 极其强大的伤害效果，几乎无法治愈。

p.k: Applies hunger to entities, and kills any plants it hits
p.v: 给予实体饥饿，并杀死所有击中的植物。

p.k: Causes plants to accelerate in growth as if they were bonemealed.
p.v: 加速植物的生长，如同使用骨粉催熟。

p.k: A more powerful version of amplify that is less mana efficient
p.v: 效力更为强大的强化，魔力使用效率下降。

p.k: Biome:
Consumed Demonic Energy
power absorbed:
Adds adverse effects to every effect in the wearer's spells.
p.v: 向佩戴者的法术中所有效果构件附加反制效果。

p.k: Has no practical purpose, fun for challenges though
p.v: 并未实际用途，但确实很有乐趣和挑战性。

p.k: Curse count:
Curse strength:
Not for the faint of heart
Summons the Demon King on use. Can be found in a structure in the demon realm.
p.v: 使用时召唤恶魔之王。可在恶魔领域的结构中找到。

p.k: Must be used in the demon realm!
p.v: 必须在恶魔领域中使用！

p.k: Dimension:

Used to draw lines of magic chalk on the ground. 
These can then be inscribed with a touch spell, which will affect the entire line. 
Can take multiple charges of a spell, and is good for defense in a pinch.
p.v:
可在地面上绘制魔法粉笔线条。
这些线迹可抄入触摸法术，法术作用于整条线迹。
可接受多次法术施放次数，很适合作为紧要关头的防御手段。

p.k:
Sigils are made with the ritual of shaping, by drawing shapes with chalk and then activating the ritual. 
More info on crafting sigils can be found in the worn notebook, and JEI support is planned.
p.v:
印记是由成印仪式制成的，需在周围绘制粉笔图案后启动仪式。
更多印记制造有关信息请参阅破旧的笔记本，JEI支持已在计划中。

p.k:
Activated Sigils are made by crafting sigils with other components. Sigils are made with the ritual of shaping. 
Fore more info, check the category on sigils in the worn notebook
p.v:
激活的印记是由印记和其他材料合成而来的。印记则由成印仪式制成。
更多信息请参阅破旧的笔记本中印记分类。

p.k: this ritual is disabled in the config
p.v: 此仪式已在配置中禁用

p.k: A more powerful version of Overgrowth that works faster and can affect more crops
p.v: 繁茂仪式的强力版本，运作更迅速，且能影响更多种农作物。

p.k: Advanced Overgrowth
Spell sigils are activated on chalk, and if the correct shape has been drawn, will cast a powerful effect at the location. To learn more, read the Arcane Compendium.
p.v: 法术印记会在粉笔图案处起效，若绘制的图案正确，则会在该处产生极其强力的效果。更多信息详见奥法纲要。

p.k: Drops from the Demon King boss, who can be summond with a demonic staff.
p.v: 由恶魔之王掉落，恶魔之王可用恶魔法杖召唤。

p.k: Found in mysterious structures.
A shard from an ancient mirror.
Dropped by demons from the demon realm
p.v: 由恶魔领域中的恶魔掉落。

p.k:
A crafting ingredient used for crafting magic chalk. 
Can also be used in a ritual of shaping to craft sigils.
p.v:
合成魔法粉笔的合成材料。
也可用在成印仪式中制造印记。

p.k:
A diamond created using arcane alchemical processes. 
Physically, it is a perfect gem, but it cannot withstand strong magical energies, and thus cannot be used to craft many advanced magical items.
p.v:
使用奥法炼金术制成的钻石。
物理意义上是完美无瑕的宝石，但它无法承受大量魔法能量，也因此无法用于制造高阶魔法物品。

p.k: The Arcane Library's collection of Arcane Magics.
p.v: 奥术图书馆辑录的奥术魔法集合。

p.k: A damaged hand-written notebook...
A scorched collection of notebook pages...
p.v: 稍受灼烧的笔记书页辑录……

p.k: An item used in crafting.
curse
